g.text: Starts the process of specifying a new product for sale
asks for the mandatory information first (internal code,short description, extended description and barcode)
shows avaliable categories and asks the user to choose one
ensure user is authenticated with the role "Sales Clerk" or "Admin"
asks user if they desire to input additional (not mandatory) information about the product
input data is now subjective, user can either add one or ten more attributes
for each attribute not shown here, the process is equal to the category method that was
shown above (call controller for setX method, which associates an attribute to the Product
for adding images the process is different
[the desired quantity of pictures is subjective to the user]
